channel.title: Papers on Arjun Anil Kumar DMS NITC
channel.description: Recent content in Papers on Arjun Anil Kumar DMS NITC

item.title: Development of new index-based methodology for extraction of built-up area from landsat7 imagery: Comparison of performance with svm, ann, and existing indices
item.description: The study proposes an urban index for computing built-up area from Landsat imagery

item.title: Cross-sectional study of factors influencing the residential water demand in Bangalore
item.description: The study investigates the influences of demographic and infrastructural covariates that drive the household water demand in the 198 municipal wards of Bangalore, India.
